Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: I'm launching NSPV chain with the pinned parameters, on komodod 0.5.0 , but I'm not able to sync any block, Idk if it is just me

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: maybe try connecting to 5.9.102.210, the stated seed node seems to not accept more than a few connections

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: actually I had to remove the `-nSPV=1` parameter when launching komodod, otherwise it wouldn't start syncing

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: -nSPV=1 makes it a superlite client, it wont sync

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that is sort of the point for it

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: oh I didn't know that, thanks for the explanation
